Your Rights with Respect to this Authorization:
Right to Refuse to Sign Authorization – I understand that I may refuse to sign this authorization and that such
refusal will not affect my health care or payment for my health care that is provided at Sturdy Memorial Hospital,
or Sturdy Health Medical Group.
Right to Revoke Authorization – I understand written notice is necessary to revoke this authorization. Such
notice should be sent to: Sturdy Memorial Hospital, Health Information Management Department, 211 Park
Street, P.O. Box 2963, Attleboro, MA 02703-0963, and will immediately become effective, upon receipt. I am
aware that revoking my authorization will not affect any information previously released with an authorization.
Expiration Date: This Authorization Expires 90 days from the date of signature below.
